src:
Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Ayam Tumini yang Berkuah Kental Gurih Mantap dari Yogyakarta
06 Nov 2019, 00:30 by Pradito Rida Pertana - detikFood


Foto: dok. detikFood / Pradito Rida Pertana

Jakarta - Pencinta mie ayam jika ke Yogyakarta wajib mencicipi 'Mie Ayam Tumini'. Berbeda dengan mie ayam biasa, racikan mie ayam ini disiram kuah kare yang kental. Nyam!Warung Mie Ayam Tumini berlokasi di pinggir Jalan Imogiri Timur, Kelurahan Giwangan, Kecamatan Umbulharjo, Kota Yogyakarta. Tepatnya di sebelah Utara Terminal Bus Giwangan. Setiap hari mereka mampu menjual 350-500 porsi. Bahkan, untuk menikmati semangkuk Mie Ayam Tumini, pengunjung harus rela mengantre.Penasaran dengan rasa mie ayam tersebut, detikcompun memesan 1 porsi mie ayam ceker. Tak sama dengan mie ayam biasa. Mie Ayam Tumini ini toppingnya 3 potong ceker ayam disiram kuah kental berwarna kecokelatan hingga menutupi mie yang berada di dalam mangkuk. Sedangkan mienya berupa mie lidi atau hokkian ukuran yang besar dengan tekstur kenyal. Tak hanya itu, potongan daging ayam pada mie ini juga berukuran besar tidak berupa daging ayam cincang. Kalau mie ayam biasa didominasi rasa manis kecap dan harum bawang putih maka kuah kental mie ini rasanya gurih manis dengan aroma wangi rempah.Ceker ayam yang cukup besar juga lembut empuk dengan rasa bumbu yang melakat.


Foto: dok. detikFood / Pradito Rida Pertana

Salah satu karyawan di 'mie ayam Tumini', Mursam (44) menjelaskan, bahwa mie ayam Tumini sudah berdiri sejak tahun 90 an. Saat itu Tumini beserta suaminya membuka warung mie ayam di sekitar Terminal Bus Giwangan."Pertama buka ya di sini (Jalan Imogiri Timur, Kelurahan Giwangan, Kecamatan Umbulharjo, Kota Yogyakarta), tapi dulu tempatnya tidak sebesar saat ini," katanya saat ditemui di warung mie ayam Tumini, Selasa (5/11/2019) siang.Pria yang sudah hampir 16 tahun bekerja di Mie Ayam Tumini ini menyebutkan jika usaha mie ayam tersebut sempat mengalami masa sulit pasca meninggalnya suami Tumini. Namun, dengan usaha keras Tumini akhirnya usahanya mulai berkembang dan sukses hingga saat ini."Jadi saat ditinggal almarhum (suami Tumini) sempat ambleg, dulu itu dalam sehari hanya habis (mie) 2 sampai 5 kilogram saja. Terus dipegang bu Tumini mulai bangkit lagi sampai jadi seperti sekarang ini," ucap Mursam.Menurutnya, berkembang pesatnya mie ayam Tumini karena memiliki ciri khas kuah ayam yang kental. Selain itu, mie yang digunakan adalah mie buatan sendiri.


Foto: dok. detikFood / Pradito Rida Pertana

"Ciri khasnya dari jaman dulu (sejak berdirinya mie ayam Tumini) adalah kuahnya yang kental, kuah (ayam) yang kental itu karena kaldunya dan pakai santan yang masak, itu yang membedakan dengan mie ayam lainnya," ujarnya."Selain itu, untuk mienya kita buat sendiri, jadi selalu fresh," imbuh Mursam.Lebih lanjut, saat ini mie ayam Tumini mampu menjual ratusan porsi dalam sehari. Bahkan, dalam sehari warung mie ayam tersebut mampu menghabiskan 60-100 kilogram mie dan 30-40 daging ayam."Kalau hari biasa bisa laku sampai 350 porsi (mie ayam), terus kalau hari Sabtu sama Minggu bisa sampai 500 porsi dalam sehari," katanya.Ada 4 varian dalam menu Mie Ayam Tumini yakni mie ayam Rp 10.000, mie ayam 1/2 Rp 8.000, mie ayam jumbo Rp 14.000, mie ayam ceker Rp 14.000 dan sawi ayam Rp 8.000. Sedangan untuk minuman tersedia, es teh, teh anget, es jeruk dan jeruk anget yang dipatok Rp 3 ribu."Sawi ayam itu hanya sawi sama kuah kental isi potongan ayam itu, gampangnya mie ayam tapi tidak pakai mie," ucapnya.Pria murah senyum ini menambahkan, mie ayam Tumini buka setiap hari mulai dari jam 10 pagi hingga sehabis waktu salat Maghrib. Kendati demikian, ia mengaku belum sampai waktu salat Maghrib terkadang sudah tutup."Tapi seringnya sebelum Maghrib itu habis," ucap Mursam.Salah seorang pengunjung, Rudi (40), warga Kecamatan Gamping, Kabupaten Sleman mengaku baru pertama kali menjajal mie ayam Tumini. Hal itu karena ia penasaran dengan rasa mie ayam dengan kuah kental."Sebetulnya saya sudah lama tahu mie ayam Tumini ini dari internet, tapi baru sempat mencoba sekarang," katanya.


Foto: dok. detikFood / Pradito Rida Pertana

Rudi menyebut, pada kesempatan pertamanya ini ia memesan mie ayam ceker. Menurutnya, penampilan mie ayam yang dipesan berbeda dengan mie ayam kebanyakan yang pernah ia coba."Diantara yang pernah saya makan ini (mie ayam Tumini) paling enak dan mantap, porsi dan rasanya juga pas. Mungkin karena kuah (ayam) yang kental ini yang bikin enak, recommended lah mas pokoknya," ujarnya."Dan mungkin kalau ada waktu luang saya akan sempatkan ke sini, karena mie ayamnya benar-benar enak," imbuh Rudi.Simak Video "Menikmati Baklava dan Kunava, Pastry Terlezat dari Turki"[Gambas:Video 20detik](odi/odi)
text:
Delicious Noodle Carts
Tumini Chicken Noodle with Strong and Delicious Soup from Yogyakarta
Nov 6 2019, 00:30 by Pradito Rida Pertana - detikFood


Photo: dock. detikFood / Pradito Rida Pertana

Jakarta - Chicken noodle lovers when going to Yogyakarta must taste 'Tumini Chicken Noodle'. Unlike ordinary chicken noodles, this chicken noodle concoction is poured with thick curry sauce. Nyam! Warung Mie Ayam Tumini is located on the edge of Jalan Imogiri Timur, Giwangan Village, Umbulharjo District, Yogyakarta City. Exactly north of the Giwangan Bus Terminal. Every day they are able to sell 350-500 servings. In fact, to enjoy a bowl of Chicken Tumini, visitors must be willing to queue. Intrigued by the taste of chicken noodles, detikcompun order 1 serving of chicken noodles. Not the same as ordinary chicken noodles. Tumini Chicken Noodle topping 3 pieces of chicken feet poured with thick brown sauce to cover the noodles inside the bowl. While the noodles are sticky noodles or large size hokkian with a chewy texture. Not only that, the pieces of chicken meat in these noodles are also large, not in the form of minced chicken. If ordinary chicken noodles are dominated by the sweet taste of soy sauce and the fragrant garlic, the thick gravy of the noodles tastes savory and sweet with the aroma of aromatic spices. The big enough chicken feet are also soft tender with a flavor of the flavored ingredients.


Photo: dock. detikFood / Pradito Rida Pertana

One employee at 'Tumini Chicken Noodle', Mursam (44) explained, that Tumini Chicken Noodle has been established since the 90s. At that time Tumini and her husband opened a chicken noodle shop around the Giwangan Bus Terminal. "First, open it here (Jalan Imogiri Timur, Giwangan Village, Umbulharjo District, Yogyakarta City), but in the past the place was not as big as today," he said when met at the stall. Tumini chicken noodle, Tuesday (11/5/2019) afternoon. This man who has been working for Tumini Noodle for almost 16 years said that the chicken noodle business had experienced a difficult time after the death of Tumini's husband. However, with Tumini's endeavor, his business finally began to develop and succeed until now. "So when left by the deceased (Tumini's husband) had a chance to disappear, in the past it was only used up (noodles) 2 to 5 kilograms only. Hold on hold, Tumini began to rise again. until it became like this now, "said Mursam. According to him, the rapid growth of Tumini chicken noodles because it has the characteristics of thick chicken broth. In addition, the noodles used are homemade noodles.


Photo: dock. detikFood / Pradito Rida Pertana

"The distinctive feature of the past (since the establishment of the Tumini chicken noodles) is the thick gravy, thick gravy (chicken) because of the broth and the use of cooked coconut milk, that's what distinguishes it from other chicken noodles," he said. we make it ourselves, so it's always fresh, "added Mursam. Furthermore, at this time Tumini chicken noodles are able to sell hundreds of servings in a day. In fact, in a day the chicken noodle shop is able to spend 60-100 kilograms of noodles and 30-40 chicken meat. "If a normal day can sell up to 350 servings (chicken noodles), then if Saturday and Sunday can be up to 500 servings a day," he said. There are 4 variants in the Tumini Chicken Noodle menu namely Rp 10,000 chicken noodles, Rp 1/2 chicken noodles Rp 8,000, Rp 14,000 jumbo chicken noodles, Rp 14,000 claw chicken noodles and Rp 8,000 chicken collards. As for the available drinks, iced tea, anget tea, orange ice and anget oranges which are pegged at Rp. 3 thousand. "The mustard chicken is only mustard and thick soup filled with pieces of chicken, easily chicken but not using noodles," he said. this added, Tumini chicken noodles are open every day starting at 10 am until after Maghrib prayer time. Nevertheless, he admitted that it was not until the Maghrib prayer time that it was sometimes closed. "But often before Maghrib was finished," said Mursam. That's because he was curious about the taste of chicken noodles with thick gravy.


Photo: dock. detikFood / Pradito Rida Pertana

Rudi said, on this first occasion he ordered chicken feet noodles. According to him, the appearance of the ordered chicken noodles is different from most of the chicken noodles he has tried. "Among the ones I have ever eaten (Tumini chicken noodles) are the best and most delicious, the portions and taste are also just right. make it delicious, recommended the main anyway, "he said." And maybe if there is spare time I will spend time here, because the chicken noodles are really tasty, "Rudi added. Watch Video" Enjoy Baklava and Kunava, the Delicious Pastry from Turkey "[ Gambas: 20sec video] (odi / odi)
